video.title: About a Boy
video.synopsis: An immature man is amazed when his new neighbors -- a ditzy single mom and her odd 11-year-old son -- awaken unexpected feelings of responsibility.

episodes.synopsis: After writing a hit song, Will Freeman is set for life, but his perfect world is turned upside down when Fiona and her son Marcus move in next door.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Will agrees to baby-sit Marcus, but he faces a dilemma when he and Andy get an invitation to rap star Lil Jon's pool party.
episodes.title: About Total Exuberance

episodes.synopsis: Will tries hard to get a much-needed guys' night out, but complications arise. Andy and his wife, Laurie, ask Will to be their son's godfather.
episodes.title: About a Godfather

episodes.synopsis: Marcus seeks Will's advice on how to get invited to a girl's birthday party, but things don't work out as anyone hoped.
episodes.title: About a Girl

episodes.synopsis: Marcus hints that Fiona and Will should date, but on the advice of her friend Dakota, Fiona asks out her plumber.
episodes.title: About a Plumber

episodes.synopsis: When Will takes Marcus to the emergency room for a cut, he meets a beautiful doctor he'll do anything to impress, even if it means bending the truth.
episodes.title: About a Bublé

episodes.synopsis: Fiona crashes Will's poker night with the guys, while Marcus has trouble fitting in during his first sleepover.
episodes.title: About a Poker Night

episodes.synopsis: Marcus gets upset when Fiona assigns him the job of slopmaster (garbage man) in a school project, and Will goes all out to impress Sam.
episodes.title: About a Slopmaster

episodes.synopsis: Game Night turns out to be anything but fun and games for Will, and Marcus feels uneasy about his new baby sitter.
episodes.title: About a Kiss

episodes.synopsis: When his dad comes to town, Marcus is thrilled, while Sam's work schedule gets in the way of her and Will's romance.
episodes.title: About a Boy's Dad

episodes.synopsis: Will is asked to help organize Marcus's birthday party, but it lands on the same day as Sam's big hospital gala.
episodes.title: About a Birthday Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Sam is evacuated from her apartment and stays with Will, but that might only be the start of big changes to come.
episodes.title: About a Hammer

episodes.synopsis: When Sam asks Will to move to New York with her, Will has a major decision to make that could end his relationship with Marcus.
episodes.title: About a Rib Chute
